alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 04 at 9:08PM PDT until October 06 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 7 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...High temperatures will range from the 80s near the coast to the upper 90s over inland parts of Orange County, the Inland Empire and warmest parts of the San Diego County Valleys. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas, San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys, Orange County Coastal Areas and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 7 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low temperatures will be mostly in the 60s which will help mitigate the effects of the daytime heat. In some coastal locations, these temperatures could be near the highest so far this year. * OUTLOOK...A cooling trend will begin Saturday.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
